remarks: In a Toset, less-than is equivalent to not inverse less-than-or-equal see ~ pltnle .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
tleile.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tleile.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
tltnle.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
tltnle $p |- ( ( K e. Toset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .< Y <-> -. Y .<_ X ) ) $.
